name: Jobs in Crypto
slogan: Our mission is to connect people with quality Blockchain and Cryptocurrency jobs
description: We firmly believe that decentralised Blockchain technology is the future, and we want to build this future by connecting talented individuals to the best Blockchain startups and companies.

team.name: David J
team.bioHtml: Founder of Jobsincrypto.co, Blockchain recruitment job board.

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
Jobsincrypto.co is the upcoming Blockchain job board. Our mission is to connect people with quality Blockchain and Cryptocurrency jobs, and to help employers find the colleagues who will help them build great Blockchain companies as fast as possible. 

We're seeking a Digital Marketing Manager to join our remote team and help us to promote this job board online and increase the website’s traffic. 

What You'll Be Doing:

Manage the website’s SEO (both on-page and off-page) 
Audience segmentation and targeting 
Strategy development for Search and Social campaigns to meet target objectives 
Organic keyword assessment and strategy development for online Search campaigns 
Develop keyword strategies for optimal performance 
Provide detailed site analysis 
Develop detailed recommendations for site changes 
Develop a comprehensive backlink strategy 
Execute recommended SEO optimizations 
Prioritize initiatives by difficulty and impact
Community management - building and increasing communities online mainly on Facebook and Twitter
manage & grow social media 
manage & improve our email outreach/marketing and increase our email newsletter subscription rate

What We Need In You:

6-12 months of experience within digital marketing or consulting
A proven track record of driving a website’s traffic to >10k unique visitors a month (this will need to be demonstrated)
Proficiency with Google digital marketing suite (Proficiency with Ad Platforms: Google Ads, Facebook/Twitter)
Experience in Microsoft Excel and Word
Familiarity with conversion and event tracking setup in Google Analytics
Experience working in a fast-paced, remote, and data-driven environment 
Should be a self-starter and problem solver


Please note that this position has no salary and instead the successful candidate will be offered 5% - 10% equity in the company and also 5-10% monthly company profit share. 

Learn more at www.jobsincrypto.co

We are looking forward to your applications.

The Jobs in Crypto Team
